mapper.select: SELECT MT_LICENSE.MT_ID AS id, MT_LICENSE.MT_PRODUCT AS product, MT_LICENSE.MT_EDITION AS edition, MT_LICENSE.MT_VERSION AS version, MT_LICENSE.MT_ACTIVATION_CODE AS activationCode, MT_LICENSE.MT_EMAIL AS email, MT_LICENSE.MT_HARDWARE AS hardware, MT_LICENSE.MT_VALID_THROUGH AS validThrough FROM MT_LICENSE WHERE MT_LICENSE.MT_ACTIVATION_CODE = #{activationCode}

SELECT MT_LICENSE.MT_ID AS id, MT_LICENSE.MT_PRODUCT AS product, MT_LICENSE.MT_EDITION AS edition, MT_LICENSE.MT_VERSION AS version, MT_LICENSE.MT_ACTIVATION_CODE AS activationCode, MT_LICENSE.MT_EMAIL AS email, MT_LICENSE.MT_HARDWARE AS hardware, MT_LICENSE.MT_VALID_THROUGH AS validThrough FROM MT_LICENSE WHERE MT_LICENSE.MT_EMAIL = #{email} ORDER BY MT_LICENSE.MT_DATE_UPDATED DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MT_LICENSE ( MT_LICENSE.MT_PRODUCT, MT_LICENSE.MT_EDITION, MT_LICENSE.MT_VERSION, MT_LICENSE.MT_ACTIVATION_CODE, MT_LICENSE.MT_EMAIL, MT_LICENSE.MT_VALID_THROUGH ) VALUES ( #{product}, #{edition}, #{version}, #{activationCode}, #{email}, #{validThrough} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MT_LICENSE SET MT_LICENSE.MT_EMAIL = #{email}, MT_LICENSE.MT_HARDWARE = #{hardware} WHERE MT_LICENSE.MT_ACTIVATION_CODE = #{activationCode}
